channel.title: CSS on Lessons & Readings
channel.description: Recent content in CSS on Lessons & Readings

item.title: Self-Paced Tutorials
item.description: Jump to: CLI tutorials, HTML/CSS Tutorials. As advertised, this course is about using R Markdown and GitHub. I appreciate that some of you may not want to spend time learning new skills that you don’t think you need. Originally I considered everything on this page to be optional, however I changed my mind. As I thought more about the structure of the course, I concluded that I would be doing you all a disservice if I made tools like HTML and CSS optional.

item.title: Resources
item.description: This page contains quick access to valuable resources, categorized by language or tool including R Markdown, YAML, Markdown, Command Line Interface, CSS & HTML, MathJax. General Learn X in Y minutes. Where X is a programming language. Tutorials available English, Spanish, and many other languages. Use the Highlight your language: button in the upper right corner to filter. Tutorials includes: R English (EN), R Espanol (ES). Markdown EN, Markdown ES.
